data.title: Charlotte Rose (Fuchs) Hutton
data.meta_description: Charlotte Rose (Fuchs) Hutton - Greece, NY - Rochester Cremation
data.text:
Greece, NY: September 17, 2021. Charlotte Rose (Fuchs) Hutton, born Sunday, November 2, 1924 in Rochester, NY to the parents of Charles and Bertha Fuchs. She was predeceased by her husband of 62 years and love of her life, Charles Maurice Hutton, Charles and Charlotte Hutton were married on January 19, 1946. Sisters, Margaret Kummer and Virginia (Dingfelder) Koshella. She is survived by her daughter, Cheryl (Herb) Robare, Craig (Sharon) Hutton, Cathy Kelly (Thomas Holden), Cindy (James) Panzetta, Charles (Donna) Hutton, Charlotte (Charles) Billotti. 14 grandchildren, 18 great grandchildren and nieces and nephews.

Charlotte was an avid member of the community. She worked for Greece Central School District for 26 years as a bus driver. As busy as she was with family, she was very devoted to the Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW) at the American Legion Greece Post 468. Charlotte was the secretary for the Greece Grange No. 311. Her allegiance to her country was very strong.

Charlotte was a wonderful daughter, wife, mother and friend to all who will be truly missed.

Friends may call Wednesday, September 29th from 9am to 12noon at Arndt Funeral Home, 1118 Long Pond Road (south of Maiden Lane), Rochester, NY. A Memorial Service will be held from 11am to 12noon in the Funeral Home Chapel. Procession to Falls Cemetery to follow service.
